text:
LOOKING FOR GUEST BLOGGERS + BLOG/PODCAST SWAP PARTNERS!

Would you like to do a guest post for Simple Creative Marketing and get featured on our blog?

Our readers are fast-growing :
- Services Businesses (coaches, consultants, accountants, etc.)
- Software (SaaS) Startups
- Online Course Creators

Topics of interest:
- stories of generating leads/sales through podcasting, live streaming, content marketing, clubhouse, Tiktok, social media marketing, email marketing, PPC, personal branding, or other
- unusual or uncommon marketing strategies/tactics
-breakdown of popular influencer/SaaS product marketing funnels
- systemizing operations/functions of the business
- building remote culture, growing a team
- other topics that would be helpful for our audience

Got a good story/case study/ article to share? Review guidelines and submit your pitch <https://www.simplecreativemarketing.com/write-for-us/|here>.

attachments.title: Write For The Simple Creative Marketing Blog - Simple Creative Marketing
attachments.text: Thanks for your interest in writing for the SCM Blog. We're always open to submissions from cool people (and businesses) doing cool things in the world of
attachments.fallback: Simple Creative Marketing: Write For The Simple Creative Marketing Blog - Simple Creative Marketing

text:
Hi <@U02280S1Q8P> the new kid on the block for podcasting is Racket <https://twitter.com/racket100>. You can reach the founder here: <https://twitter.com/awwstn>

Another text tool I'd recommend is <http://Otter.ai|Otter.ai>. I know the product manager if you'd like an intro.

If you're wanting quotes from copywriters who are using Jarvis (formerly <http://Conversion.ai|Conversion.ai>), I'll be happy to contribute. I've been publishing resources (tutorials and articles) on Jarvis. Happy to share them with you too.
